pr_title: Fix for checkFFDC failures on Java 15

timeline.message: fix for checkFFDC failures on java 15

timeline.bodyText: I am suggesting to keep checkFfdc() for Java 14 and lower.  Create a new method for Java 15 and make the message field mandatory.
timeline.author: fmhwong

timeline.message: Add new test to check for ffdc log in Java 15
